'''Jordan Campbell''' is an American [[flow arts]] theorist who co-created [[Transition Theory]] with [[Noel Yee]] in 2010 at the [[Vulcan Lofts]] in Oakland, California. Transition Theory describes how spinners move between pattern states using soft, hard, and mixed transitions, and was described by Yee as the development that "settled the core dogma of [[Vulcan Tech Gospel|VTG]]."<ref name="transition-theory">{{cite web |url=https://noelyee.com/transition-theory-with-noel-yee/ |title=Transition Theory with Noel Yee |publisher=Noel Yee}}</ref>
